subject: CE326631020DE
description_text:
Good morning,

I still didint receive my package. In the link to follow, there is no new
status sińce 12.11.
Can You please help?
SSN3305

conversations.body_text: Hi Kacper Myga,     Your parcel has been returned. Please verify your address details.  Kacper Kwiecień  Rzepakowa 1A  40-541 Katowice  Poland  +48 664 524 392

Dear Sir/Madam,

I would like to emphasize that the shipping address was provided correctly,
yet the courier did not attempt to deliver the package and did not contact
me by phone on the provided number.

Furthermore, until yesterday, the parcel status indicated that the package
was stationary. I have now noticed that the statuses have been changed, and
the shipment is most likely already returning to your warehouse.

I have been waiting for the product for a very long time, and therefore I
am urgently requesting a prompt reshipment of the product.

Since the courier failed to deliver the package to the original address, I
can provide an alternative shipping address:

 * Name: Kacper Myga
 * Address: WINCENTEGO POLA 21c/20
 * Postal Code: 40-596
 * City: Katowice
 * Phone number: 666079976

I kindly request urgent information regarding the date of the reshipment to
the new address.

Sincerely,
Kacper Myga


pt., 21 lis 2025, 08:35 użytkownik service@simsonn.com

Can you update on the package?

pt., 21 lis 2025, 13:22 użytkownik Kacper Myga <kacpermyga65@gmail.com>
